name: Kingdom of Sea - MMORPG 2D
description:
Kingdom of Sea is a pixelart style online role-playing game.

The game is small and loads quick, but offers much more than you would expect from a game of this size.

KOS's list of features is huge. You can fight monsters, fish, farm, blacksmith, work as a healer, lumberjack, carpenter, tailor, trap disarmer, artist, forger, etc.

KOS is free to play forever. You can log on and play without ever paying a penny.
